title: Still Banned after a 14-Day Suspension??

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Just worried if league stuffed up my ban and isn't actually a 14-Day ban, But a perm ban ;P, It's been over 30min since I should've been unbanned

replies.body: Weird, this account isn't showing up as banned. It does look like the ban was set to lift today, so you might have been trying a little too early is all. When you have a set date on a punishment, it's best to wait until the next day to be sure the ban doesn't lift a little later on.
